      • scrollTabToVisible

        public final void scrollTabToVisible(int index)
        Scrolls tab to visible area. If tabbed pane has JTabbedPane.WRAP_TAB_LAYOUT layout policy then the method does nothing.
        Specified by:
        scrollTabToVisible in interface TabbedPane
        Parameters:
        index - index of tab to be scrolled.
